repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Peter M. Strang Collection of Textile Industry Photographs

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photographs included depict : picker rooms, a modern one-process picker, finish pickers in an old picker room, overhead cleaners and duct humidification, modern spinning rooms with individual motors, spinning room with 4- frame motor drive, typical spinning room shaft alley (belt alley).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Peter M. Strang Collection of Textile Industry Photographs #6833 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: American Textile History Museum Collection, gift of Peter M. Strang

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The ATHM# references the accession number given to collections by the American Textile History Museum. These numbers have been kept and tracked for reseachers looking for former citations. For images, these numbers will also be the digital object identifer if the item was scanned.

controlaccess.corpname: Pettee Machine Works (Newton Upper Falls, Mass.)

did.unittitle: Finisher Pickers in Picker Room, ATHM# 0000.1514.1

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Interior view of mill - Kitson Machine Co., Decatur, AL

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Interior view, Passaic Cotton Mills, Passaic, NJ

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Interior view of one-process Whitin picker machine.

did.unittitle: Shaft alley (belt alley) in spinning room, unidentified mill, ATHM# 0000.1514.4

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing the shaft or belt alley where the belts run from each spinning frame up to the ceiling. Spinning frames made by Pettee Machine Works. Written on reverse: "Typical Spinning Room Shaft Alley (belt alley) in the Early 1920s."

did.unittitle: Spinning room with 4-frame motor drive, unidentified mill, ATHM# 0000.1514.5

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [?; original 1920-25]. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the Interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing cotton spinning frames made by Whitin Machine Works. Room is very large. Written on reverse: "Spinning Room with 4-Frame Motor Drive." 25.5 x 20.75 cm.

did.unittitle: Modern spinning room, unidentified mill, ATHM# 0000.1415.6

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Coxe Studio, High Grade Photography, Greenville, S.C., photographer. Gelatin silver print. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing cotton spinning frames made by Whitin Machine Works. Written on reverse: "Modern Spinning Room with Individual Motors, Overhead Cleaners, and Duct Humidification."
